## Leave-one-out Cross-validation

The formula for the leave-one-out cross-validation estimate of the prediction error is

$$MSE = \frac{1}{n} \sum_{i=1}^{n} (y_i - \hat{y}_i)^2$$

where $y_i$ is the true response value for observation $i$, and $\hat{y}_i$ is the predicted response value.
